pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prognostic Predictive Lasso for Biomarker Selection // We provide new tools for the identification of prognostic and predictive biomarkers. For further details we refer the reader to the paper: Zhu et al. Identification of prognostic and predictive biomarkers in high-dimensional data with PPLasso. BMC Bioinformatics. 2023 Jan 23;24(1):25.
